typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	entity: 'Jobs?$filter=Timestamp gt 2021-09-12T00:00:00Z and OwningTeamId eq \'M365FleetAGCEngineering\'',
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'documentPerLine']) ~> ODataJob
ODataJob sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		JobId as string,
		ParentId as string,
		RootId as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		Cloud as string,
		Tenant as string,
		ServiceHostCapability as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		FinishDate as timestamp,
		StateName as string,
		PackageId as string,
		Workflow as string,
		HostName as string,
		ServiceHostLocation as string,
		Timestamp as timestamp,
		Notes as string,
		IsBlockingPathCandidate as string,
		IsBlockingPathPresent as string,
		ComponentOwnerId as string,
		OwningTeamId as string,
		Client as string,
		TotalTaskCount as integer,
		FinishedTaskCount as integer,
		BlockedTaskCount as integer,
		ParametersJson as string,
		SettingsJson as string,
		MdmId as string
	),
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> KustoJob
